text: The 2024 Delaware gubernatorial election was held on Tuesday, November 5, 2024, to elect the governor of Delaware. Incumbent Governor John Carney was term limited through the state's constitution and could not run for reelection to a third term. == Background == === Eligibility and requirements === Section 6 of the Delaware Constitution states for a person to serve as governor must: * be a citizen of the United States for at least 12 years * be at least 30 years old. * be a permanent resident of Delaware for at least six years. The state's constitution forbids anyone from being elected governor more than twice. == References == Category:2020s in Delaware Category:2024 elections in the United States Category:Gubernatorial elections in the United States
title: 2024 Delaware gubernatorial election
